snippet: On Thursday, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority plans to announce its first licensed app to serve as a guide to the 186 permanent works installed throughout the subway system, and to a few dozen more in the Metro North and Long Island Rail...
abstract: On Thursday, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority plans to announce its first licensed app to serve as a guide to the 186 permanent works installed throughout the subway system, and to a few dozen more in the Metro North and Long Island Rail Road systems.

headline.main: MTA to Introduce Public Art App
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Offers an App For Subway Art
